## useWatch() function

Custom hook to subscribe to field change and isolate re-rendering at the component level.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useWatch<TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues, TFieldName extends FieldPath<TFieldValues> = FieldPath<TFieldValues>>(props: {
    name: TFieldName;
    defaultValue?: FieldPathValue<TFieldValues, TFieldName>;
    control?: Control<TFieldValues>;
    disabled?: boolean;
    exact?: boolean;
}): FieldPathValue<TFieldValues, TFieldName>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | { name: TFieldName; defaultValue?: [FieldPathValue](./react-hook-form.fieldpathvalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;TFieldValues, TFieldName&gt;; control?: [Control](./react-hook-form.control.md)<!-- -->&lt;TFieldValues&gt;; disabled?: boolean; exact?: boolean; } | defaultValue, disable subscription and match exact name. |

**Returns:**

[FieldPathValue](./react-hook-form.fieldpathvalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;TFieldValues, TFieldName&gt;

## Remarks

\[API\](https://react-hook-form.com/docs/usewatch) â€¢ \[Demo\](https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-v7-ts-usewatch-h9i5e)

## Example


```tsx
const { watch } = useForm();
const values = useWatch({
  control,
  name: "fieldA",
  defaultValue: "default value",
  exact: false,
})
```
